Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1985, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1985, hitting .359 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Toronto, driving in 6 runs on 10/23/1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1985...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/12/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $11,250,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1986, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 6/8/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1986, hitting .625 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Traded from Montreal to San Diego on 4/18/1990 (Going to SD: LF Pedro Guerrero. Going to MON: P Don Peters, P Jeremy Hernandez, P Toby Borland, P Alejandro Pena)...
